title: Development of Digital Tools for Mathematics Learning Design Using Conversational Frameworks

context.prior_knowledge: Experience with basic digital tools and secondary-level mathematics knowledge
context.additional_context: Digital Learning Design Competency Development Program for Strengthening Mathematical Job Competencies for Managers/Leaders in Corporate Settings. Requires Implementation of Project-Based Collaborative Learning in Smartphone-Centric Limited Technology Environments

learning_goals: Learners can generate learning designs applying at least three mathematical concepts (e.g., statistics, functions, geometry) using tools based on conversational frameworks
Learners can revise learning designs incorporating peer feedback at least twice using automated interpretation features of digital tools
Learners can complete team-based PBL assignments with over 80% completion rates using digital artifacts accessible in smartphone environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
